name: MeetingUniverse
tag_list: hotel-ratings, hotel, meeting-planner, incentive-planner, aaa, mobil, tripadvisor, meeting, meetings
overview:
The first company to provide hotel ratings for meeting planners. Current ratings by AAA and Mobil as well as TripAdvisor revolve around individual travelers.

MU also provide 1. internal business intelligence to hotels to improve their operations. 2. external business intelligence to benchmark against competitors. 3. The ability to showcase and market superior meetings performance to gain additional meetings business.

Finally, MU provides other vendors to the meetings industry the ability to be chosen by planners based on reviews from other planners. Listings are ordered in priority of performance rather than marketing budget.
